backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, portfolios, and Yahoo Finance HTTP outcalls with access control enforcement. Provides CRUD-like portfolio access and market data fetch functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing case-insensitive holdings search and listing related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files covering routing, hooks, components, charts, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes along with global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app component handling hash‑based routing, authentication flow, and theme selection for public vs authenticated routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/Allocatio: Renders a Recharts donut chart showing allocation by holding, using live quotes or fallback prices.
frontend/src/components/charts/Performan: Renders a portfolio performance line chart using historical data with range selector and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main layout with responsive sidebar behavior and a top navigation bar, wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Displays portfolios, live metrics, and navigation actions, including creating new portfolios.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, ticker search, portfolio switcher, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/market/LastUpdat: Shows how many seconds ago data was last updated, refreshing every second.
frontend/src/components/market/MobileTic: Mobile dialog wrapper for ticker search with typeahead selection and closing behavior.
frontend/src/components/market/TickerTyp: Provides debounced ticker search with dropdown results, keyboard navigation, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AddEdi: Modal for adding or editing a holding, including ticker search and form validation before mutation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Create: Dialog for creating a new portfolio with name input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Delete: Confirmation dialog that deletes a portfolio using a mutation and navigates home on success.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Holdin: Displays portfolio holdings with metrics, search, optional edit/remove actions, and price overrides.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Clickable portfolio summary card showing total value, returns, and a sparkline chart.
Panel to toggle public visibility of a portfolio and copy its public share URL.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Remove: Dialog confirming removal of a holding and executing the remove mutation.
frontend/src/components/theme/PublicThem: Theme provider that forces light mode for public-facing pages.
frontend/src/hooks/actorReady.ts: Utility that waits for an actor to appear in React Query cache, with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook returning a debounced version of a changing value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, loading, login, and identity storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: React-query hooks fetch live quotes, search results, and historical data for stocks and crypto, including crypto ID resolution and parsing utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioSimulatio: Manages portfolio simulation state with global price moves and per-ticker overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks handle CRUD operations for portfolios and holdings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme with persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables define light/dark themes and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioMath.ts: Computes holding- and portfolio-level metrics including market value, returns, and daily changes.
frontend/src/lib/simulationQuotes.ts: Generates simulated quote data by applying overrides or global moves to live prices.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Provides crypto ID mapping and parsing utilities for Yahoo Finance and CoinGecko responses.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page loads portfolios, fetches related quotes, and renders portfolio cards with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Portfolio detail page that loads a user’s portfolio, live/simulated quotes, calculates metrics, and renders holdings, charts, and management modals.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPortfolioPage.t: Public view of a shared portfolio including live/simulated quotes, metrics, charts, and error handling for private or missing portfolios.
frontend/src/pages/TickerPreviewPage.tsx: Displays live price, change data, and a 30‑day chart for a single stock or crypto ticker using live and historical market data.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as signed USD strings with two decimal places.
frontend/src/utils/textSearch.ts: Implements basic case‑insensitive text normalization and substring search utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session‑stored values, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, breakpoints, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata and state tracking, including a pending feature request to make holdings search case‑insensitive.
